alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 22 at 4:27AM MST until October 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. The strongest winds are expected from 8 PM MST tonight through 8 AM MST Sunday morning. * WHERE...Much of north-central and northwestern Arizona. * WHEN...From noon today to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In addition to the wind, snow showers will develop over the mountains tonight into Sunday morning which may cause areas of blowing snow and poor visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Yavapai County Mountains
